about_the_game:
WELCOME TO HUMAN & POWER!

Hello, new team member!

We are excited to welcome you to our family of professionals dedicated to lighting up the world! As part of your training, we want to introduce you to a unique experience that reflects the challenges and rewards of working with us.

THE PROFESSIONALS' ADVENTURE

Get ready to dive into a world that combines ̷t̷e̷r̷r̷o̷r̷ roguelie, Deck Building and platformer aspects, constantly challenging expectations!


In this arcade game, you're not just playing—you’re confronting enemies that threaten our nation! Every run is unique and highly challenging, where you’ll sharpen your skills to become Employee of the Month. With each achievement, you can climb the ranks, competing to see who reaches the top and, perhaps, earning the respect of your peers!

PROCEED WITH CAUTION

Remember: don’t let curiosity get the best of you—some mysteries are better left unsolved. What happens in the game may echo beyond, and we know each of you plays a vital role in our mission to power the future!

Feel the adrenaline, but don’t face the unknown head-on. Have fun while learning about the courage and camaraderie that make our team so special. And of course, keep your eyes wide open.

. ... .. .- .--. . / ... .. --- -- / .-- .... .- - / .--. . .. ... . -.. ..- - ... / -.-- --- ..-

We look forward to seeing you shine in leadership and lighting our path together!

Sincerely,

Human&Power

name: MONOTONIA

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bits
  • Processor: AMD Athlon™ 3000G
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: VEGA 3 or superior
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bits
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 3 2200G
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: VEGA 7
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Monotonia is a horror roguelite deck-builder that traps you in a haunting cycle of work, payment, and survival. Navigate a sinister gamified workstation, build your deck, and endure the oppressive months ahead to face the terror that lies beyond.
supported_languages:
English, Portuguese - Brazil*, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
